options.title: Settings
options.desc: Set up the form for creating a new task

settings.base: Automatically create tasks within a selected profile when it's your client's birthday.
settings.not_active: Install the widget to begin setup.

field.title: Birthday field
field.desc: Select a field that contains the birthday date
field.tip: Select a field type "date", "birthday" or "date and time", or create a new field by clicking "Add new field"

type.desc: Select the type of task to assign

responsible.desc: Assign a user responsible for this task

errors.template_fields_required: Enter the template name and message text to continue.

modal.title: Create new Birthday field
